main event: A brilliant white light approached a car at high speed, increasing in size before disappearing at Fairchild AFB, Washington, on 3rd September 1950.
interesting points: The object was initially the size of an auto headlight, but grew to a very large size, leaving a fiery trail in various colors.
Report concluded the object's nature as 'Astro (METEOR)' despite its unusual behavior.
The document is from Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program investigating UFOs.
Three instances of sightings of unusual aerial objects were reported by personnel, involving rated officers and considered competent and reliable witnesses.
No satisfactory explanation was found, ruling out aircraft, meteorites, and other natural phenomena.
sighted object: Brilliant white light with rapid size increase and fiery trail
